response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and functionality. This product is not just an item, but a solution tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its quality and versatility, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $150.
